function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Recruitment of international staff may increase the risk of introducing contagious diseases from abroad.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within the lodge and local community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health screening and quarantine protocols for all incoming international staff.","Technologies":"Health screening tools, quarantine facilities, and contact tracing technology.","People":"International staff, local community, lodge guests.","Owner":"Management, healthcare professionals, and local authorities."},{"Description":"Incorporating students and graduates as trainees and staff may introduce contagious diseases to the lodge.","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission within the lodge and surrounding community.","Mitigation":"Establish regular health check-ups, vaccinations, and strict hygiene protocols for all trainees and staff.","Technologies":"Health monitoring tools, vaccination programs, and hygiene management systems.","People":"Trainees, graduates, lodge staff, and surrounding community.","Owner":"Management, healthcare professionals, and local authorities."},{"Description":"Failure to retain and train qualified staff for managerial positions may lead to higher turnover and increase the risk of disease transmission due to frequent staff changes.","Impact":"Disruption in lodge operations, increased risk of disease transmission, and impact on guest experience.","Mitigation":"Provide extensive training, motivation, and support for managerial staff, and implement backup staffing plans to minimize the impact of turnover.","Technologies":"Training and development programs, staff scheduling and management software, and performance management tools.","People":"Management, staff, guests, and surrounding community.","Owner":"Executive leadership, HR department, and management team."}]}
